desc: Bunny Paige by Lauren Tatum is a Cleveland jewelry, accessories, & fashion brand. Bunny Paige is known for her original iconic Spiked Heart jewelry, bold fashion-forward designs & expertise in crystal pave. Seen at NYFW, in Marie Claire, Vogue, L'Officiel, & Cirque Du Soleil. #WearYourHeart #SpikedHeartClub
